duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide day-to-day direction and supervision of direct reports.
Establish priorities and responsibilities that provide the most value.
Conduct performance evaluations, employee development plans, salary reviews, and compensation recommendations.
Convert sales forecast into resource demands and work with Sales and Operations to create and maintain effective production and inventory plans.
Monitor and maintain inventory location control accuracy.
Represent inventory and planning needs in system software upgrades and decisions.
Improve inventory record accuracy to the desired level by implementing best practice processes and controls.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or an equivalent combination of education, training, and experience.
5+ years of experience in materials management.
Thorough knowledge of the principles of materials management.
Thorough knowledge of manufacturing ERP systems.
High level of capability with MS Office Suite, database programs.
